abstract: Two people are stuck on a remote island with a horrible monster. What should they do to maximize their chance of survival?
snippet: Two people are stuck on a remote island with a horrible monster. What should they do to maximize their chance of survival?
lead_paragraph: Our challenge this week was suggested by Chris Roat, who calls it “one of my favorite puzzles of the year.” And Dr. Roat sees a lot of puzzles — he’s an active participant in Bay Area puzzle competitions and a longtime Google employee currently up to something top-secret at Google X. His suggestion for this week is a continuation of our recent Andrew Luck Monster Problem. Put on your headgear and get ready for —
